dc_title_s: A new & accurate map of Asia : drawn from actual surveys, and otherwise collected from journals ; assisted by the most approved modern maps & charts. the whole being regulated by astron. observations
dc_description_s: Cartographic Details: Scale [1:26,000,000]. Numbered"NÂ°52." Decorative title cartouche with palm tree. Shows boundaries, rivers, islands and principal settlements. Relief shown pictorially. London meridian.|35 x 43 centimeters|Scale [1:26,000,000]|Ames Library of South Asia Maps
